short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: This extension sets your search engine to Rapusia and customizes your new tab page so you can help social and eco-friendly projects
short.de: Mit dieser Erweiterung kannst du Rapusia als Standardsuchmaschine einrichten und deine neuen Browsertabs anpassen.
short.es: Esta extensión establece Rapusia como buscador predeterminado y personaliza la página de nueva pestaña.
short.fr: Cette extension permet de faire Rapusia votre moteur de recherche et de personnaliser la page « Nouvel onglet » de votre navigateur.
short.it: Questa estensione imposta Rapusia come motore di ricerca e personalizza la nuova scheda così da aiutare progetti sociali e…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
★ How it works

- You search the web with our search engine
- While you search ads, you raise money for Rapusia
- Rapusia uses these founds to help social and eco-friendly projects

Obviously, like all other search engines, we also uses advertising partners. However, this advertising is not linked to previous searches made by the user but only to the one currently in progress. Half of the revenues obtained from the ads are donated to social and eco-solidarity projects. Each search made accumulates a heart (the symbol chosen by the creators of Rapusia) for the user as a result of the advertising that is proposed. Once enough hearts have been accumulated, the user can choose a project he wants to finance and Rapusia converts the drops into money.

Read more on our FAQ: https://rapusia.org/faq/

★ Privacy is important

We use an anonymous search engine that doesn’t track you. We do not collect and share information from your web queries with advertisers.
Read more about our privacy policy: https://rapusia.org/privacy/

★ Required permissions:

This extension will ask you for this permissions:
"Change your search settings to rapusia.org" - this permission allows us to change your default search engine to rapusia.org
"Set your new tab page to our extension" - this permission let us display our search bar when you open a new tab

★ Who is behind Rapusia ?

A group of three highly motivated people. Rapusia was born from the efforts of a Foundation (Tennis World Foundation) and the Coppini Trading company (which manages sports information sites: Wrestling, Tennis and Football) through its founders, who wanted create an eco-friendlier alternative to commonly-used search engines.

Furthermore, we had the desire to raise funds for the Tennis World Foundation that helps disadvantaged children in the world through tennis.

You can write to us through details provided in the "Contact" section, ourteam will be happy to answer you!

You can learn more about us here: https://rapusia.org/about-us/
long.de:
Rapusia funktioniert wie jede andere Suchmaschine, mit einem Unterschied: Wir verwenden unsere Gewinne, um soziale und Umweltprojekte zu unterstützen.

WIE FUNKTIONIERT ES ?
- Sie durchsuchen das Netz mit Rapusia
- Während Sie Anzeigen suchen, sammeln Sie Geld für Rapusia
- Rapusia verwendet diese Mittel, um Sozial- und Umweltprojekte zu unterstützen

Mehr über unsere Philosophie erfahren Sie hier:
https://rapusia.org/about-us/
long.es:
Rapusia funciona como cualquier otro motor de búsqueda, con una diferencia: utilizamos nuestras ganancias para ayudar a proyectos sociales y ambientales.

COMO FUNCIONA ?
- Buscas en la red con Rapusia
- Mientras busca anuncios, recauda dinero para Rapusia
- Rapusia utiliza estos fondos para ayudar a proyectos sociales y medioambientales.

Puedes aprender más sobre nuestra filosofía aquí:
https://rapusia.org/about-us/
long.fr:
Rapusia fonctionne comme tout autre moteur de recherche, à une différence près: nous utilisons nos bénéfices pour aider des projets sociaux et environnementaux.

COMMENT ÇA MARCHE ?
- Vous cherchez sur le net avec Rapusia
- Pendant que vous recherchez des annonces, vous collectez des fonds pour Rapusia
- Rapusia utilise ces fonds pour soutenir des projets sociaux et environnementaux

Vous pouvez en savoir plus sur notre philosophie ici:
https://rapusia.org/about-us/
long.it:
Rapusia funziona come qualsiasi altro motore di ricerca, con una differenza: utilizziamo i nostri profitti per aiutare i progetti sociali e ambientali.

COME FUNZIONA ?
- Tu effettui una ricerca in rete con Rapusia
- Gli annunci sponsorizzati raccolgono denaro per Rapusia
- Rapusia utilizza questi fondi per aiutare i progetti sociali e ambientali

Puoi saperne di più sulla nostra filosofia qui:
https://rapusia.org/about-us/
